Class SmartGovContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.AbstractContext
      • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.SmartGovContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OsmContext

    public class SmartGovContext
extends AbstractContext
    Context implementation, that contains common elements to any simulation.
